basics.name: Eyan Documet
basics.label: Mechanical Engineering Student
basics.summary: Mechanical Engineering student well-versed in mechatronics, energy and electrical systems, programming, simulation, prototyping, and manufacturing. Proven leader and collaborator. Eager to contribute to impactful technologies.

work.summary: Provided one-on-one tutoring for various STEM courses including calculus, physics, and engineering mechanics.
highlights: Led biweekly review sessions, improving student understanding and grades in core STEM subjects.
Developed individualized study plans for students to enhance problem-solving skills and intuition.

extracurriculars.summary: Design and optimization of rear suspension for solar-powered race car, focusing on dynamic analysis and suspension geometry.
highlights: Designed and implemented rear suspension systems using SolidWorks and Fusion360.
Conducted Finite Element Analysis (FEA) to validate structural integrity and minimize weight.

extracurriculars.organization: College of the Canyons Chemistry Club
extracurriculars.summary: Co-led the execution of experimental designs, organized public scientific demonstrations, and managed club logistics.
highlights: Co-led experimental designs with faculty, ensuring safe and engaging science demos.
Optimized procurement processes for chemicals and equipment while adhering to safety regulations.

extracurriculars.summary: Performing in improv and sketch comedy shows as part of a student troupe.
highlights: Collaborate with team members to write and perform sketches and improv scenes.
Participate in bi-weekly rehearsals and public performances.

awards.title: MESA Outstanding Service Award
awards.awardedBy: Mathematics Engineering Science Achievement (MESA), College of the Canyons

awards.title: College of the Canyons Honor Roll
ASG Exemplary Student Scholarship
awards.awardedBy: College of the Canyons Associated Student Government

awards.title: California State Seal of Biliteracy
awards.summary: Awarded for completing four years of French classes and passing both the AP French and AP Spanish exams.

volunteer.summary: Lead and facilitate daily activities as a camp counselor, creating a safe and engaging environment while promoting teamwork among participants. Managed conflicts and ensured compliance with safety regulations.
